definition: to strike, thrust or shove against, (baseball) the act of hitting a baseball lightly without swinging the bat
details:
verb
- to strike, thrust or shove against
= example: to strike, thrust or shove against
= synonyms: butt
- to hit a ball in such a way so as to make it go a short distance, typically in baseball
= example: to hit a ball in such a way so as to make it go a short distance, typically in baseball
= synonyms: drag a bunt
noun
- (baseball) the act of hitting a baseball lightly without swinging the bat
- fungus that destroys kernels of wheat by replacing them with greasy masses of smelly spores
- similar to Tilletia caries
= synonyms: stinking smut
- disease of wheat characterized by replacement of the grains with greasy masses of smelly smut spores
= synonyms: stinking smut
